chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is an iPhone 13 mini that has the above problem:

The condition of the received device does not match 'very good'. The casing has scratches, where you can see pure aluminum - even from a distance of over 50 cm from the device. I only turned on the device to take a proof picture with the screen on. After that, the device was immediately turned off again.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
